content: Voter outreach | San Francisco Skip to main content English Español 中文 Filipino Menu Services Departments Search Voter outreach We help local residents understand the voting process. Year-round, our multilingual outreach team works to spread the word about voter registration and voting process. We focus on reaching out to people who: speak languages other than English have disabilities are unhoused or housing insecure are involved with the justice system Schedule an outreach event Our staff can provide presentations on topics such as: voter registration voting options language services and translated materials accessible services and tools ranked-choice voting poll worker service We can also host a resource table at your site. To invite us, use our Event Request Form or call 415-554-5685. You can also check our Outreach Calendar for upcoming events. Get outreach materials You can use our Materials Request Form to order paper copies of these materials. We print them in English, Chinese, Filipino and Spanish.
